comment: Drinks way above its price point. Easy/Medium finish but everything else is 100%. Great nosing, great taste and flavor.
Tough drink for me, very strong smoke/peat taste and not much else coming through
Did a great job for it's price. Smooth and flavorful of southern Scotland. I do not love the finish.
I don't like this one.  Very light in tasting, funny astringent after taste.
